resources.string: Pinch speed\'s slider\nand tilt device \nleft/right for turning
Settings for the PiKoder/SSC. The parameters are transferred and stored in the PiKoder/SSC\'s EEPROM memory.
Please go to www.pikoder.com for more information.
Stop when the connection is lost:
